topic.title: Standing Order Food Item - conformance rules

section.p: A record of a standing order food item and the quantity in which it is ordered.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] standingOrderFoodItem with data type Code
A food item that is requested as part of a standing order.

Contains exactly one [1..1] quanity with data type Integer Ratio
The ordered quantity of the requested food item.

Contains exactly one [1..1] standingOrderFoodItem with data type Code
A food item that is requested as part of a standing order.

Contains exactly one [1..1] quanity with data type Integer Ratio
The ordered quantity of the requested food item.
